DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: Shanenko, A. A.;SHANENKO, A. A.;SHANENKO, A A;SHANENKO, A.A.;SHANENKO, A. A;SHANENKO, A.A;SHANENKO, ARKADY A.;SHANENKO, ARKADY

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui mestrado em theoretical and mathematical physics - Lomonosov Moscow State University (1987) e doutorado em theoretical and mathematical physics - Lomonosov Moscow State University (1993). Atualmente physics department da Universidade Federal de Pernambuco. Tem experincia na rea de Fsica, com nfase em Supercondutividade, atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: superconductivity, theory e nanoscale.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: master's at theoretical and mathematical physics from Lomonosov Moscow State University (1987) and doctorate at theoretical and mathematical physics from Lomonosov Moscow State University (1993). Has experience in Physics, focusing on Superconductivity, acting on the following subjects: superconductivity, theory and nanoscale.
